enchantment.ensorcellment.air_affinity.d: Removes the mining speed penalty when not on the ground.
enchantment.ensorcellment.angler.desc: Provides a chance of catching extra items when fishing.
enchantment.ensorcellment.bulwark.desc: Prevents the wielder from being knocked back.
enchantment.ensorcellment.curse_mercy.de: Prevents a weapon from dealing a lethal blow.
enchantment.ensorcellment.damage_ender.d: Increases damage dealt to Ender mobs and inhibits teleportation.
enchantment.ensorcellment.damage_illager: Increases damage dealt to Illager mobs.
enchantment.ensorcellment.damage_village: Increases damage dealt to Villager mobs.
enchantment.ensorcellment.excavating.des: Increases the number of blocks harvested.
enchantment.ensorcellment.exp_boost.desc: Increases experience gain when using the item.
enchantment.ensorcellment.fire_rebuke.de: Sets attackers on fire while knocking them away.
enchantment.ensorcellment.frost_rebuke.d: Slows and weakens attackers while knocking them away.
enchantment.ensorcellment.frost_walker.d: Freezes surface water and lava, allowing traversal.
enchantment.ensorcellment.gourmand.desc: Food is more nourishing and satisfying when consumed.
enchantment.ensorcellment.holding.desc: Increases the storage capacity of certain items.
enchantment.ensorcellment.hunter.desc: Provides a chance of additional drops from slain animals.
enchantment.ensorcellment.leech.desc: Restores health when a mob is killed.
enchantment.ensorcellment.magic_edge.des: Slightly increases damage dealt and converts it to magic.
enchantment.ensorcellment.magic_protecti: Reduces damage taken from magical sources.
enchantment.ensorcellment.phalanx.desc: Allows the wielder to move faster while using a shield.
enchantment.ensorcellment.preservation.d: Removes the increasing XP cost for repairing an item.
enchantment.ensorcellment.quickdraw.desc: Decreases the amount of time needed to fully draw a bow.
enchantment.ensorcellment.reach.desc: Increases the distance that the wielder can interact with blocks.
enchantment.ensorcellment.smashing.desc: Harvested ores will be smashed to pieces, improving yield.
enchantment.ensorcellment.smelting.desc: Harvested blocks will automatically be smelted, as if by a Furnace.
enchantment.ensorcellment.soulbound.desc: The item will remain with the owner after an untimely demise.
enchantment.ensorcellment.trueshot.desc: Increases the accuracy and speed of arrows, and allows them to pierce.
enchantment.ensorcellment.volley.desc: Additional arrows are fired with each shot. Only one arrow is consumed.
enchantment.ensorcellment.vorpal.desc: Randomly performs powerful attacks and decapitations.
